filepath_map_regex_replace.description: This preference must be a json array. Each element of the array must be another array of 4 strings. The first two strings are a pair of regex search and replace to map an incoming (virtual) path to a local filepath. The second pair of strings are likewise regex searh/replace expressions to map the local filepath back to the 'virtual' filepath.
